#summary Building from source
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

  # Download sources archive
  # You'll need to install the developer tools and libraries for Qt, QtWebkit and Phonone.

== Ubuntu 11.10 ==

  # {{{sudo apt-get install build-essential devscripts fakeroot}}}
  # {{{sudo apt-get install libqt4-dev libqtwebkit-dev libphonon-dev}}}

== Ubuntu 10.04 ==

  # Add Kubuntu PPA: {{{sudo add-apt-repository ppa:kubuntu-ppa/backports}}}
  # {{{sudo apt-get update}}}
  # {{{sudo apt-get install build-essential devscripts fakeroot}}}
  # {{{sudo apt-get install libqt4-dev libqtwebkit-dev libphonon-dev}}}

== Create package ==

  # Unpack sources: {{{tar -xf qt-webkit-kiosk-<version>.tar.gz}}}
  # {{{cd qt-webkit-kiosk-<version>}}}
  # {{{debuild -us -uc}}}
  # *Done*
